home_subtitle: Before you give in, take a moment to revisit your regrets.
intervention_no_regrets: You haven't added any regrets yet.
regrets_empty_description: Start by documenting moments you want to remember when tempted.
regrets_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this regret?
import_modal_merge_description: Add imported data to existing data (recommended)
import_modal_replace_description: Delete all existing data and replace with imported data
pwa_install_subtitle: Add to your home screen for quick access
stats_no_activity: No activity yet. Start using the app to see stats!
footer_privacy_notice: All data stays on your device. Your privacy is protected.
install_already_installed_desc: Great! {appName} is already installed on your device.
install_works_offline_desc: Access your regrets anytime, even without internet
install_quick_access_desc: Launch directly from your home screen like a native app
install_private_secure_desc: All data stays on your device, never uploaded
install_no_app_store_desc: Install directly from your browser, no downloads needed
install_ios_step1: Tap the {icon} Share button at the bottom of Safari
install_ios_step2: Scroll down and tap {action} "Add to Home Screen"
install_ios_step3: Tap "Add" in the top right to confirm
install_android_step1: Tap the menu button (⋮) in your browser
install_android_step2: Select "Add to Home screen" or "Install app"
install_chrome_step1: Click the install icon ⊕ in the address bar (right side)
install_chrome_step3: Click "Install" to add to your desktop/taskbar
install_edge_step1: Click the install icon ⊕ in the address bar
install_edge_step2: Or click Settings menu ⋯ → "Apps" → "Install this site as an app"
install_edge_step3: Click "Install" to add to your Start menu/taskbar
install_firefox_warning: Firefox doesn't support PWA installation yet
install_firefox_desc: For the best experience, try using Chrome or Edge to install {appName}.
install_firefox_bookmark: You can bookmark this page (Ctrl+D) for quick access.
install_safari_desc: For the best experience on macOS, try using Chrome or Edge to install {appName}.
install_safari_bookmark: You can bookmark this page (⌘+D) for quick access.
install_generic_step1: Look for an install icon in your browser's address bar
install_generic_step2: Or check your browser's menu for "Install app" option
install_generic_step3: Alternatively, bookmark this page for easy access
install_help_text_before: If you're having trouble installing, feel free to check out the
install_help_text_after: for more information or to report an issue.
new_regret_title_placeholder: e.g., Wasted 4 hours on social media
new_regret_description_placeholder: Describe what happened and how you felt...
new_regret_setup_intro: Select the addictions/temptations you want to track. You can always change this later.
new_regret_select_one_alert: Please select at least one addiction to track
new_regret_fill_required_alert: Please fill in both title and description
addictions_page_description: Learn about common addictions, their mechanisms, and evidence-based treatment approaches.
addictions_select_prompt: Select an addiction above to learn about its treatment approaches
addictions_tip_text: When creating a regret entry, you can select this addiction to access quick treatment tips and track patterns specific to this behavior.
stats_clear_confirm_message: This will delete all events and reset your statistics to zero. Your regrets will not be affected. This action cannot be undone.
